base.planning:
Planning step
- Choose only 1
Move up to your ships speed.
Gain credits 2 000.
Recover all damage from character and ship.
Pay credits 3 000 (if defeated).
Lose all secret cards (if defeated).
Play any "Planning" on Player, Ship, Crew, Secret or any other card.
base.action:
Action step
- Perform any or all
Deliver cargo and bounties.
Market action (if on a planet).
May discard a card from top of a market deck.
May buy top card of a market deck. Then, resolve patrol movement on next card, if any.
Trade cards with a player in your space.
Play any "Action" on Player, Ship, Crew, Cargo, Gear, Mod, Secret, Ambition or any other card.
base.encounter:
Encounter step
- Choose only 1
Fight a patrol (required if you have negative reputation with a patrol in your space).
Resolve a space encounter card (Planet, Maelstrom, Navpoint.
Encounter facedown contact (resolve a databank card) or fight bounty.
Play any "Encounter" on Player, Ship, Crew, Secret, Ambition or any other card.

expansion.planning:
Planning step
- Choose only 1
Move up to your ships speed.
Gain credits 2 000.
Recover all damage from character and ship.
Pay credits 3 000 (if defeated).
Lose all secret cards (if defeated).
Play any "Planning" on Player, Ship, Crew, Secret or any other card.
expansion.action:
Action step
- Perform any or all
Deliver cargo and bounties.
Market action (if on a planet).
May discard up to 2 cards from top of a single market deck.
May buy top card of a market deck. Then, resolve patrol movement and reveal contact icons on next card, if any.
Trade cards with a player in your space.
Play any "Action" on Player, Ship, Crew, Cargo, Gear, Mod, Secret, Ambition or any other card.
expansion.encounter:
Encounter step
- Choose only 1
Fight a patrol (required if you have negative reputation with a patrol in your space).
Resolve a space encounter card (Planet, Maelstrom, Navpoint, Core Worlds).
Encounter facedown contact (resolve a databank card) or fight bounty.
Play any "Encounter" on Player, Ship, Crew, Secret, Ambition or any other card.

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Gain credits2 000.
action: Buy a bounty card, even if in navpoint. If unable and on a planet, discard the top card of the cargo market deck and gain credits 4 000.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
c. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
d. Gain 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Gain credits 2 000.
action: If bounty slots are full, buy a gear card. Otherwise, buy a bounty card, even if at a navpoint.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
c. Reveal the face-down contact of the lowest class on this planet.
d. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
special: If not all crew slots are full, gain the crew that matches a face-up contact of the lowest class on this planet for free.

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Gain credits 2 000.
action: If bounty slots are full, discard this player's highest-class bounty that does not match a character, crew or face-up contact anywhere in the world.

If not all bounty slots are full, reveal cards from a bounty market deck until a bounty that matches character, crew or face-up contact is revealed. Gain that bounty. Then shuffle the bounty market deck.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Gain credits 2 000.
action: Buy a gear card. If unable and on a planet, discard the top card of the cargo market deck and gain credits 4 000.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a patrol in this space that has ship attack less or equal to this player's ship attack.
c. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
d. Gain 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.

c. Gain credits 2 000.
action: Buy a ship card. If unable and on a planet, discard the top card of the cargo market deck and gain credits 4 000.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a patrol in this space that has ship attack less or equal to this player's ship attack.
c. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
d. Gain credits 4 000. Then, lose 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.

c. Gain credits 2 000.
action: If Bane has at least 1 fame and less than credits 20 000 , he loses 1 fame and gains credits 10 000.
Buy a ship card. If unable, buy a ship gear.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
c. Spend credits 15 000 to gain 2 fame.
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.

b. Move toward nearest undefeated character, if Bossk can reach their space. Do not stop on Maelstrom.

action: Recover all damage.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.

c. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, face-up contact).
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.

planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move directly to the space of the other player with the most negative reputations (minimum of 1) - if reachable by Dengar's ship speed.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Each other player (across all of the world) loses 1 reputation of their choice.
action: Each other player in this space suffers 2 damage on their character for each of their negative reputations. If a character is defeated this way, Dengar gains 1 fame.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
c. Gain credits 4 000.
special: Discard top cards from job and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.

planning: !. If IG-88 has at least 1 droid crew, do the FIRST 2 that apply.
a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, face-up/face-down contact).
If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
c. Gain credits 2 000 for each of IG-88's droid crew.
action: Buy a ship card. If unable - buy a ship gear.
Gain the crew matching the nearest face-up droid contact for free.

help.content:
Player token as encounter
When player token is revealed as an encounter, that token is removed from the game and another contact token is revealed.

AI vs unopposed bounty (not protected)
If bounty contact token is:
on a planet.
is a Crew of another AI.
is a Crew of Player who does not want to protect it.
Bounty becomes eliminated. Do all below:
a. Remove contact from the game.
b. Gain reward on bounty card.
c. Suffer damage according to bounty card land attack or ship attack.

AI vs Player's Crew member opposed bounty (protected by Player)
Fight against protector Player as normal.
If the AI bounty hunter wins in a bounty fight:
Crew card and token are removed from the game.
AI player resolves "After you gain a reward" from the bounty card.
If the AI bounty hunter loses in a bounty fight.
The bounty job is discarded.

AI vs Player/AI
Fight is resolved normally.
If bounty hunter wins:
Bounty job card is removed from the game.
"Player bounty reward" is gained (see below).
If bounty hunter loses:
Bounty job card is discarded.

Player Bounty Rewards
Instead of gaining rewards from a bounty card matching a player's character, do the following:
Gain credits5 000 and 1 fame.
Gain 1 reputation with 1 faction of your choice with which that player has negative reputation.
Lose 1 reputation with 1 faction of your choice with which that player has positive repoutation.

Перевірка майстерності
Порахуй кількість згадок навички, яку перевіряєш (у персонажа та у всіх членів екіпажу).
Кинь 2 кубики.
Дпя успіху потрібно, щоб випав хоча б 1 відповідний результат.
0 навичок: crit (Падаван).
1 навичка: crit або hit (Джедай).
2+ навичок: crit, hit або focus (Магістр).

Де Здобути славу
Персональна мета.
Мета корабля.
Розшуки.
Халтурки.
Доставка протизаконних вантажів.
Перемога над патрулями 2 і 3 рівнів.
Карти з luxury колоди ринку.

Favors

Player can request the following favors from another player (in any space):
Advice: Gain 1 of that player's skills for 1 skill test.
Combat Strategy: Roll 1 additional die during a combat.
Endorsement: Gain 1 of that player's positive reputations until end of turn.
Shortcut: Gain +1 speed until end of turn reputations until end of turn.

Cards
Do not resolve any encounter cards.
Do not use abilities on cards, except for abilities that increase the values on their ship or character (ground/space combat, HP/hull)
If the smuggler AI player delivers a cargo that rotates, rotate that card and place a goal token on the new destination.

Movement
Choose the shortest path to the goal, event if encounter partols.
Do not fight partols, just stop on those having neutral or negative reputation.
Do not stop on Maelstrom.
If AI would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
Cannot go through the Core Worlds.

Buying
Buy makert cards as normal (if enough credits and have a free card slot).
Barter ship cards (pay the difference between current and new ships).
Discard market card
up to 2 times

if:
Cannot be bought on AI's planet.
Not enough credits.
No free slots.
Ship costs same or less than that the AI has.
Cargo destination is a patrol.
"Wanted" job, "Information Broker" or the "Special Order" card

Card has restrictions (e.g. "Limit 1 Armor per character").
After buying a card, resolve partol movement by shortest way possible towards AI space.
<div class="phaseElement">After buying a card, resolve contact token
that matches AI's lowest class bounty or thecontact token
of the lowest class.

Starting ship
G-1A Starfighter.

Starting ship
G9 Rigger.
